endpoints.description: Analyze the uploaded material data and determine its recyclability classification.
Retrieve the list of possible material categories for classification purposes.
Update information for a specific material by providing its identifier.
Remove a specified material and its data using its unique identifier.
Fetch aggregated statistical data of classified materials over a defined period.
Submit a batch of materials within a waste stream for analysis and classification.
Access the classification results for a specified waste stream.
Identify suitable recycling facilities for recyclable material types.
Submit a recycler's information to enhance the database of recycling options.
Receive recommendations for improving the recyclability of specific materials.
